article_title: There’s no need to hoard food — but falling loonie will raise your grocery bill
article_description: Sylvain Charlebois of Dalhousie University speaks about the state of our food supply chain and how the pandemic will effect food prices
article_content: Sylvain Charlebois  of the School of Public Administration at Dalhousie University  speaks with the Financial Post s Larysa Harapyn about why we re seeing empty shelves in stores amid the COVID 19 pandemic  the state of our food supply chain and how all this    26 chars
